name: Gopinath Sivagnanam
summary: Full Stack Developer with specialized experience in Industrial IoT integration. Proven track record at ProcessDrive India developing CRM (SYFOL) and CMMS (AIM2C) solutions. Expert in bridging software with hardware through TDD and on-site requirement analysis.

education.institution: SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Chennai

highlights: Integrated IoT hardware with web dashboards.
